historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-1177.7.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary addition of subchapter, see note to § 2-223.01.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-223.01.

DC CODE § 2-223.07

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: This subchapter shall apply to actions taken after July 13, 1998.
This subchapter shall apply to employees of the WMATA when the Commonwealth of Virginia and the State of Maryland enact similar provisions for WMATA whistleblowers.

subchapter.text: Employees of District Contractors and Instrumentality Whistleblower Protection.
